HERO_TITLE: Empowering Solopreneurs & Businesses with Custom Web Solutions
HERO_TAGLINE: Specialized Front-End, Full-Stack, and Consulting Services to Drive Your Success.
HERO_OPTIONAL_IMAGE: A clean, modern design showing code snippets, app interfaces, or a professional workspace.

services.title: Front-End Landing Pages for Solopreneurs
services.description: Utilizing Jamstack technologies like Angular, we create SEO-friendly landing pages with simple contact forms, ideal for professionals offering up to three service types. Capture leads and present your offerings effectively.

services.title: Custom Applications
services.description: We develop robust full-stack applications tailored to your unique business needs. Leveraging Angular, Spring Boot, databases, and reporting tools, we build scalable and efficient solutions.

services.title: Consulting Services
services.description: Obtain expert consulting in Front-End, Back-End, and Salesforce Apex development. We offer competitive hourly rates to help you overcome technical challenges and optimize your projects.

TECHNOLOGY_SECTION_DESCRIPTION: We specialize in modern technologies to deliver high-quality solutions.
TECHNOLOGY_TECHNOLOGIES: Angular, Spring Boot, Jamstack, Databases (e.g., PostgreSQL, MySQL), Reporting Tools, Salesforce Apex
WHY_CHOOSE_ME_POINT_1_DESCRIPTION: We focus on your specific needs, whether it's a landing page or a complex application.
WHY_CHOOSE_ME_POINT_2_DESCRIPTION: We possess deep knowledge in modern web technologies and a commitment to quality.
WHY_CHOOSE_ME_POINT_3_DESCRIPTION: Working directly with you ensures clear understanding and efficient development.
WHY_CHOOSE_ME_POINT_4_DESCRIPTION: We provide high-value services at competitive hourly or project-based rates.

CONTACT_ERROR_PROJECT_DESCRIPTION_GUIDAN: Please provide a brief description of your project. Include details about your goals, desired features, any specific technologies you prefer, and your timeline.
